channel.title: Deception-PS| Custom 317 Server| loading 562/602|
channel.description:
Deception-PS is a Custom 317 Server loading 562/602 Maps and other aspects. Here at Deception we strive to provide each player with a pleasant and enjoyable stay, through our dedicated host and staff team. Deception constantly goes through new updates to ensure that the players are always kept entertained with new content. As the owner of Deception, I am completely dedicated to making the most enjoyable experience possible for each and every player, and as our motto says “Deception is made by the players, for the players”, and we strive to uphold that motto every day.
Server Management: H20 – Main Owner
------=Helpful Links=------- Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/9ygj0tuql6zy05l/Deception.jar?dl=0 Forums: http://deception-ps.com/forum/ Youtube:[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sjYqVZfCP98]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sjYqVZfCP98[/url] ---Pictures--- [url=http://postimg.org/image/xho0bwf3v/][img]http://s9.postimg.org/xho0bwf3v/Untitledsss.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://postimg.org/image/9c3sn6wzd/][img]http://s4.postimg.org/9c3sn6wzd/Untitledsd.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://postimg.org/image/kte42v73l/][img]http://s8.postimg.org/kte42v73l/asd.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://postimg.org/image/plqrrr0rl/][img]http://s24.postimg.org/plqrrr0rl/Untitleddsa.jpg[/img][/url]
Server Features: ut it is your choice. Main Features:
Fully working curses Fully working spell books with correct animations Player Auction Custom Dungeoneering System All skills working Donator/Mega Donator Zone Custom quest tab Fully working XP Counter Fully working Money Pouch Fully working emotes Custom bosses Fully working slayer system Auto-Join clan chat on login Chaotics/Nex sets/Primal equipment 5 Fully Mini games A more fun skilling system 24/7 Uptime - VPS Hosted - NO LAG! Daily updates Great Economy Dedicated staff/owner ----------------------------------------------------- This Just in from the Owner Hello Deception is back online ready for some new players, We usually don't do this but since we been off, First 3 players gets donater rank.10 players we will have a drop party, Yes it's a custom server yes i still need to change stuff. Please register to our forums, I've been coding, and not worrying about some zones! Post your IGN on Forums!

Deception-PS is a Custom 317 Server loading 562/602 Maps and other aspects.
Here at Deception we strive to provide each player with a pleasant and enjoyable stay, through our dedicated host and staff team. Deception constantly goes through new updates to ensure that the players are always kept entertained with new content. This Just in from the Owner
Hello Deception is back online ready for some new players, We usually don’t do this but since we been off, First 3 players gets donater rank.10 players we will have a drop party, Yes it’s a custom server yes i still need to change stuff. Please register to our forums, I’ve been coding, and not worrying about some zones! Post your IGN on Forums!
